Title: Establishes the "right to repair farm equipment act"
Summary: Establishes the "right to repair farm equipment act" to protect the rights of consumers to diagnose, service, maintain, and repair farm equipment; requires original equipment manufacturers to make equipment available to independent repair providers under fair and reasonable terms.
LawCode: Add Art 33-C ยง698, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing the "right to repair farm equipment act" to require original equipment manufacturers to make certain equipment available to independent repair providers under fair and reasonable terms
